item.text: When I came to you, brothers and sisters, I did not come with superior eloquence or wisdom as I proclaimed the testimony of God.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="2919" class="">decided</st> to be <st data-num="1492" class="">concerned</st> about <st data-num="3756" class="">nothing</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>.

<st data-num="2504">And I</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">was</st> <st data-num="4314">with</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">much</st> <st data-num="5156" class="">trembling</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">My</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">conversation</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2782" class="">preaching</st> were <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3981" class="">persuasive</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">words</st> of <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="585" class="">demonstration</st> of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> of <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>,
so that your faith would not be based on human wisdom but on the power of God.
Now we do speak wisdom among the mature, but not a wisdom of this age or of the rulers of this age, who are perishing.

<st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st> we <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> the <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="613" class="">hidden</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4309" class="">determined</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="165" class="">ages</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.

<st data-num="3762" class="">None</st> of the <st data-num="758" class="">rulers</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="165" class="">age</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understood</st> it. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> they had <st data-num="1097" class="">known</st> it, they would <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> have <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> of <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>.
But just as it is written, “Things that no eye has seen, or ear heard, or mind imagined, are the things God has prepared for those who love him.”

<st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> has <st data-num="601" class="">revealed</st> these to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> <st data-num="2045" class="">searches</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all things</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="899">deep things</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> among <st data-num="444" class="">men</st> <st data-num="1492">knows</st> the things of a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> the <st data-num="444">man’s</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">within</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>? <st data-num="3779" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">knows</st> the things of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1487 3361">except</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st> of the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> who is <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> may <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> the things that are <st data-num="5483">freely given</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> we <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> about <st data-num="3739">these things</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3056">words</st> <st data-num="1318" class="">taught</st> us by <st data-num="442" class="">human</st> <st data-num="4678" class="">wisdom</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> those <st data-num="1318" class="">taught</st> by the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="4793" class="">explaining</st> <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual things</st> to <st data-num="4152">spiritual people</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="5591 444">unbeliever</st><n id="1" /> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1209" class="">receive</st> the things of the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> they are <st data-num="3472" class="">foolishness</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> them, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they are <st data-num="4153" class="">spiritually</st> <st data-num="350" class="">discerned</st>.

The one who is <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="350" class="">discerns</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">yet</st> he <st data-num="846" class="">himself</st> is <st data-num="350" class="">understood</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st>.
For who has known the mind of the Lord, so as to advise him? But we have the mind of Christ.
